price: 117. Dan Tuhanmu tidak akan membinasakan negeri-negei secara zalim, selama penduduknya orang-orang yang berbuat kebaikan.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā muṣ'liḥūna
